name: Rocky Shooter
description:
Rocky Shooter is a First-Person Shooting game, made simple and clean.  As it can be a competitive game used in tournaments, the settings are equal for everyone (terrain, weapons, resolution, sound, etc. are the same for every player – no menu for changing the environment) The goal is to clean out the arena from all targets as fast as you can. You have 2 minutes to complete the mission. Improve your time, and get better on every next round. Good luck, and have fun!

Join the Discord: https://discord.gg/SBqRUA2B
